itinerary.mapNote: Past Russell Glacier terminus. Tundra lakes begin. 375m.
Open Arctic tundra. No trees. Reindeer frequent. 280m.
Optional canoe crossing of Amitsorsuaq lake. 200m.
River crossing terrain. Arctic fox and musk ox. 150m.
Coastal hills emerging. Views widening westward. 100m.
Greenland's second-largest town. Colourful houses. Trail end. 0m.

waypoints.name: Russell Glacier
waypoints.note: Greenland ice sheet outlet glacier. Dramatic calving terminus near start.

waypoints.name: Amitsorsuaq Lake
waypoints.note: Largest lake on route. Optional canoe crossing saves 15km.

waypoints.name: Sisimiut
waypoints.note: Trail end. Greenland's 2nd city. Museum, kayaking, Northern Lights.

waypoints.name: Kangerlussuaq
waypoints.note: Trail start. Former US Air Force base. Musk ox often near runway.

waypoints.name: Arctic Circle (66.5°N)
waypoints.note: The trail's namesake latitude. Crossed approximately Day 5–6.
